title: As a WBC User, I want to see a Tournament Rosters tab
custom_steps:
Wire: https://zpl.io/25pD1M8

AC:

If a Federation has been added to the Main Tournament on the settings page, there will be a Tournament Rosters page visible

Clicking Main Tournament will open the Main Tournament tab

There will be 3 collapsible sections on the tab:

Available

Provisional

Final

title: As a WBC User, I want to view an Available Players section on the Tournament Rosters tab
custom_steps:
Available Players: https://zpl.io/aMpJND7

AC:

WIll display help text at top of roster

Values in help text will be driven by system values

The first section on the Main Tournament tab will be titled Available and be collapsed by default

The number of players on the available players list will show in the header

There will be help text indicating how many players can be added to the provisional roster where the number of players is based on the provisional max limit for the main tournament

The section will contain all the selected Federations player's with an Eligibility Status of Approved

BOC users will see a federation dropdown to switch between rosters

Clicking on the players name should open the profile

title: As a Fed User, I want to add a player to my Provisional Roster on the Main Tournament tab
custom_steps:
Wireframe(s):

Available Players: https://zpl.io/aMpJND7

Provisional Roster: https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW

AC:

Clicking the add player icon in the Available Players section will add the player to the Provisional Roster

Players name will grey out in the Available Players section when they are on the Provisional Roster

title: As a WBC User, I want to view an Final Rosters section on the Tournament Rosters tab
custom_steps:
Description

Wireframe: https://zpl.io/a3jxd0l

AC:

The third section on the Qualifying Roster tab will be titled Final and be collapsed by default

The number of players on the Final Roster will show in the header

There will be a section for each of the following: categories:

Catchers

Pitchers

Infield

Outfield

Each section will have the max number of rows (set in system settings)

The layout will match the provided wireframe

title: As a WBC User, I want the Available Players List populated from the Qualifying Tournament
custom_steps:
AC:

If a Federation has been added to the Main Tournament on the settings page, their Available Players List will be auto-populated with the players on their Qualifying Roster Available Players List

This happens when they are added to the main tournament

Players will not be removed from the Qualifying Rosters

title: As a WBC Admin, I want Eligible Players sent to the Main Tournament's Available Player's List
custom_steps:
AC:

If the “Add Available Players to” field on the Settings page is set to “Main Tournament Roster,” players will be added to the Available Players List on the Main Tournament page when their Eligibility Status is updated to Approved

(This story is hooking up the radio button on the settings page)

title: As a Team Admin, I want to remove a player from the Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
Wireframe(s):

Provisional Roster: https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW

Clicking on the options icon will reveal a remove player option

Clicking remove player will remove the player from the provisional and indicate there are unsaved changes on the form

Will become un-greyed out in available list

title: As a Team Admin, I want to upload player docs to the Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
Wireframe(s):

Provisional Roster: https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW

Same Player Docs modal as here: https://zpl.io/bJWdJdD

AC:

Clicking on the Options Icon on a player's row, will launch the options menu, as depicted in the wire

On the options menu, "Player Docs" will be an option

Clicking a Player Docs will launch the upload modal

You will be able to drag and drop file attachments to the modal

You will be able to click Browse and open a file browser to attach files

You will be able to attach multiple files

There will be a trash can icon for each file attached

Clicking the trash can will remove the file

There will be a required label field for attached files

Label options will be:

Birth Certificate

Passport

PPA

Other

Label’s may not be used more than once on the same file

When a label has been added for all attached files, the Save Documents button will become active

Clicking save documents will attach the files and commit changes, dismiss the modal, and return a green confirmation message

Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm they wish to discard their changes

If they confirm the decision, their changes will be discarded and the form will reload in view mode

If they do not confirm the decision, the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.

Uploaded docs will also be available on the player’s profile in the attached files section

title: As a Fed User, I want to be stopped from adding too many players to the Main Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
Wireframe(s):

Global Error Messages: https://zpl.io/a8Jyr1d

“The player cannot be added to the Provisional Roster because it exceeds the [system value] player maximum.”

Overridable by BOC Admin

Fires on drag and drop

title: As a User, I want to view the player portion of the Provisional Roster section on the Main Tournament tab
custom_steps:
Wireframe(s):

Provisional Roster: https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW

The second section on the Qualifying Roster tab will be title Provisional and be collapsed by default

The number of players on the Provisional will show in the header

This story includes the Uniform, Pants, Jersey, and Hat columns

title: As a User, I want to view the staff portion of the Provisional Roster section on the Main Tournament tab
custom_steps:
Wireframe(s):

Provisional Roster: https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW

AC:

There will be a staff section added to the Provisional Roster Portion of the Main Tournament tab

There will be three sub sections, one for each of the following:

Managers

Coaches

Trainers

The layout will match the provided wireframe

Each section will have the max number of rows (set in system settings)

title: As a Team Admin User, I want to view a list of my staff next to the Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
Wireframe(s):

Provisional Roster: https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW

AC:

There will be a staff list in the Provisional section of the Qualifying Roster tab, as depicted in the provided wire

The list will be populated with all staff associated with the country being viewed

There will be a select2 search to help find staff in the list

title: As a Team Admin User, I want to create a new staff member
custom_steps:
Wireframe(s):

Provisional Roster: https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW

Staff Profile: https://zpl.io/2G1ZrNE

AC:

There will be a “Create Coaching Staff Member” button at the bottom of the staff list, as depicted in the provided wire

If the Main Tournament tab is dirty when the button is clicked, a modal will be displayed prompting the user to save changes before continuing: https://zpl.io/bz6K7Oz

Choosing Save Changes will bring the user to a new, blank staff profile page

If the Main Tournament tab is NOT dirty when the button is clicked, the user will be taken to a new, blank staff profile page

title: As a User, I want to save a Staff Profile
custom_steps:
Data Discovery: WBC Staff Profile 

Wireframe(s):

Staff Profile: https://zpl.io/2G1ZrNE

AC:

When viewing a staff profile, there will be Save and Cancel buttons

If the form is clean, the buttons will be disabled

If the form is dirty, the buttons will be active

Clicking Save will run a required field check and, if it passes, commit any changes made

Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm their action

title: As a Team Admin User, I want to add staff to my Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
Wireframe(s):

Provisional Roster: https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW

AC:

Users will be able to click and drag Staff Members from the list to the Provisional Roster sections

Adding them to the roster will removed them from the staff list

title: As a User, I want to see Coaching Staff Minimums called out on the Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
Wireframe(s):

Provisional Roster: https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW

AC:

Each of the staff sections on the Provisional Roster will display the minimum number of staff needed (set in system settings), as depicted in the wire

The minimum number will turn red if the minimum is not met

title: As a User, I want to remove a Staff Member from the Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
Wireframe(s):

Provisional Roster: https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW

AC:

Clicking on the options icon will reveal a remove staff option

Clicking remove staff will remove the staff member from the provisional roster and indicate there are unsaved changes on the form

The staff member will once again appear in the staff list

title: As a Team Admin User, I want to upload an NPPA to a staff member on the Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
Wireframe(s):

Provisional Roster: https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW

AC:

Clicking on the Options Icon on a staff member's row, will launch the options menu, as depicted in the wire

On the options menu, "NPPA" will be an option

Clicking NPPA will launch the upload modal

You will be able to drag and drop file attachments to the modal

You will be able to click Browse and open a file browser to attach files

You will be able to attach multiple files

There will be a trash can icon for each file attached

Clicking the trash can will remove the file

There will be a required label field for attached files

Label option will be:

NPPA

Other

Label’s may be used more than once

When a label has been added for all attached files, the Save Documents button will become active

Clicking save documents will attach the files and commit changes, dismiss the modal, and return a green confirmation message

Clicking Cancel will prompt the user to confirm they wish to discard their changes

If they confirm the decision, their changes will be discarded and the form will reload in view mode

If they do not confirm the decision, the user will be returned to the form and no action will be taken.

Uploaded docs will also be available on the staff member’s profile in the attached files section

title: As a User, I want to download documents that have been uploaded to the Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
Wireframe(s):

Provisional Roster: https://zpl.io/VKD5pQW

AC:

When viewing the Provisional Roster, there will be a paper clip icon in the NPPA, PPA and Other Docs columns (staff vs players)

Clicking the paper clip icon will download all the relevant attached documents

title: As a User, I want to Export the Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
Wire: https://zpl.io/a3jxd0l

AC:

When viewing the Provisional Roster, there will be an export icon, as depicted in the wire

Clicking the icon will export the Provisional Roster to an Excel file

The export will have the same population, columns, order, and formatting as the UI

title: As a User, I want to Save my Qualifying Roster Tab
custom_steps:
AC:

If changes have been made the save button will be enabled and a cancel button will be present

Clicking Save

Commits changes

Triggers a green notification “Saved”

Disables the save and cancel button

title: As a User, I want to Cancel changes to my Qualifying Roster tab
custom_steps:
AC:

If changes have been made the save button will be enabled and a cancel button will be present

Clicking Cancel

Triggers a modal https://zpl.io/2v6GdrQ

Clicking Discard Changes

Discards changes

Disabled the save and cancel button

Clicking back dismisses the modal

Clicking X dismisses the modal

title: As a Fed User, I want to add players to my Final Roster
custom_steps:
Wireframe(s):

Dragging Players from the Provisional Roster into position slots on the Final Roster: https://zpl.io/a3jxd0l

AC:

Players on the Provisional Roster with an uploaded PPA will have an enabled drag and drop icon

Users will be able to drag players from the provisional into position blocks on the final roster

Players that have been added to the Final Roster will have a grey row background and the drag and drop icon will be greyed out

If a player has been added to the final roster they cannot be deleted from the provisional and that link in the options dropdown will be greyed out

title: As a Fed User, I want to Remove players from the Final Roster
custom_steps:
Wireframe(s):

AC:

There will be a trashcan next to the players name on the final roster

Clicking the trashcan will remove the player from the final roster and enable the save and cancel buttons

If a player is removed from the final roster the drag and drop icon will be active again and the row on the provisional will no longer be greyed out

title: As a BOC Admin, I want to Finalize a Team's Final Roster
custom_steps:
Wire: https://zpl.io/amWqYgm

AC:

On the bottom of the Qualifying Roster tab, there will be a Finalize Roster button for the BOC Admin users

Clicking the Finalize Roster button will prompt the user to confirm their decision:

Body: Please confirm you want to finalize the roster for the following federation.

Buttons: Finalize, Cancel

Clicking Finalize will finalize the roster

Clicking Cancel will dismiss the modal

Finalized rosters will displayed ‘Finalized’ along with the the timestamp and username of the finalizing user, as depicted

Once the roster is finalized, Team Coordinators will not longer be able to make edits to the roster

BOC Admins will retain the ability to edit the roster after it is finalized

title: As a BOC User, I want the Rule Checks to Fire when Finalizing the Roster
custom_steps:
AC:

When the BOC Admin user finalizes a federations roster, rule checks will fire:

All Players have PPA uploaded

Error Message: “All players are required to have a PPA uploaded”

All Staff have NPPA uploaded

Error Message: “All staff are required to have a NPPA uploaded”

Numbers of Players and Staff are above specified Minimums

Error Message: “The minimum requirement for staff has not been met”

All Pants, Hat, Jersey sizes must be input

Error Message: “Player and/or staff uniform sizes are missing”

All Players and Staff must be assigned a number

Error Message: “Player and/or staff uniform numbers are missing”

Any failed rule checks will be returned to the user

The BOC Admin User will have the ability to override any failed rule checks and continue with finalizing the roster

title: As a User, I want Minimums for Catchers and Pitchers on Final Roster
custom_steps:
Wireframes:

Final Roster: https://zpl.io/a3jxd0l

Settings: https://zpl.io/aw6oonM

 

AC:

On the settings page, we will now show a Minimum box for Pitchers and Catchers on the Final Roster section

The screen will clearly label minimums and maximums (similar to provisional roster limits)

There will be red text on the final roster sections when minimums are not met (same way this is handled for staff)

There will be additional rule checks upon finalizing the roster

Number of Catchers are below the specified minimum

Error Message: “The minimum requirement for Catchers has not been met”

Number of Pitchers are below the specified minimum

Error Message: “The minimum requirement for Pitchers has not been met”

title: As a User, I want to be prevent from placing a position player in a pitcher or catcher spot on the Final Roster
custom_steps:
Wireframes:

Error Pitcher: https://zpl.io/aR9qLZg

Error Catcher: https://zpl.io/a3dvy7d

AC:

When dragging a player to the final roster, the system will perform a check to compare the player's profile position with the position it's being dragged to

If the profile position is anything other than LHR, LHS, RHR, RHS, they will not be allowed to be placed in a pitcher box

If the profile position is anything other than C, they will not be allowed to be placed in a catcher box

If the check fails, a modal will be returned. The modal will match the wireframe.

Selecting a new position will enable the Update Position button(pitching modal only)

Clicking Update position will save the new position, dismiss the modal and add the player to the relevant final roster block and trigger a green notification “Position updated”

Clicking Back dismisses the modal

title: As a user I want to be prevented from removing a player from the interest list if they're on the provisional
custom_steps:
AC:

If a player is on the provisional roster disable the remove player link in the player options dropdown

title: As a user I don't want to see anyone on available players that isn't on the interest list
custom_steps:
AC:

If an eligible player is removed from the interest list they should no longer appear on the available players list

title: As a User, I want a Final Roster flag exported with the Provisional Roster
custom_steps:
AC:

When the Provisional Roster is exported to Excel, there will be "Final Roster?" column included

If a player on the Provisional Roster has been added to the Final Roster, this column will display "Y"

If a player on the Provisional Roster has not been added to the Final Roster, this column will display "N"

title: As a User, I want to Export the Final Roster
custom_steps:
Wire: https://zpl.io/a3jxd0l

AC:

When viewing the Final Roster, there will be an export icon, as depicted in the wire

Clicking the icon will export the Final Roster to an Excel file

The export will have the same population, columns, order, and formatting as the UI

title: As a BOC WBC Admin, I want to see a new Pitch Tracker tab in the WBC Portal
custom_steps:
Wire: https://zpl.io/a3omj78

AC:

When BOC Admins are viewing a Federations page, they will see a new Pitch Tracker page

Only BOC Admin will have permissions to see this tab

There will be a dropdown filter to switch between the Qualifiers and Main Tournament

The dates that appear in the pitch tracker will be driven by the start and end dates on the settings page

The player population on the pitch tracker will be pitchers appearing on the final roster

The cells in the tracker will be editable (3 digits)

If a player is affiliated, his name will include his Org (i.e. NYY)

title: As a BOC WBC Admin, I want the WBC Pitch Tracker to calculate when a pitcher is available to pitch
custom_steps:
Wire: https://zpl.io/a3omj78

Rules: Pitch Tracker Calculations 

AC:

When pitch counts are entered into the tracker, the tracker will calculate how many days the player must rest

The pitch tracker will display gray “rest” boxes on days the pitcher is not allowed to pitch

Users will not be able to input pitch counts into “rest” boxes

The pitch tracker will update in real time, displaying rest days without needing to click save
custom_expected:
50+ = 4days

30-49 = 1day

2days in a row of less than 49 pitches each = 1day

title: As a WBC User, I want the System Settings page to have start and end dates for the qualifiers and main tournament
custom_steps:
Wire: https://zpl.io/aw6oonM

AC:

On the Settings page in WBC, there will be start and end dates added to both the Qualifiers and Main Tournament sections, as depicted in the wire

These dates will all be required

title: As a BOC WBC Admin, I want to export the Pitch Tracker
custom_steps:
Wire: https://zpl.io/a3omj78

AC:

There will be an export button on the Pitch Tracker

Clicking the button will export the pitch tracker and data into an excel file

If a player is affiliated, his name will include his Org

 

There will be an Export All Feds button on the Pitch Tracker

Clicking this button will export all the Feds' pitch trackers into one excel file

If the filter is set to Qualifiers, export all Qualifier Pitch Trackers

If the filter is set to Main Tournament, export all Main Tournament Pitch Trackers

If a player is affiliated, his name will include his Org
